ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And they say, 'When will this promise come about if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: “When will this threat (of Resurrection) come to pass? Tell us if indeed you are truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The unbelievers say, "When will the Day of Judgment come if what you say is at all true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When will this threat come to pass, if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They also say, 'When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak truly?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When will this promise be fulfilled, if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when will this promise be fulfilled if ye say sooth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And they say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, should you be truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Further, they say, "When will this promise (come to pass), if what ye say is true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "When will this promise (i.e. Resurrection) be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They also say: 'When will this promise be, if what you say is true'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When will this promise be, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:48]   And they say, ‘When will this promise, of resurrection, be [fulfilled], if you are being truthful?’, therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) and the disbelievers of Mecca say: (When will this promise) which you promise us, Muhammad, (be fulfilled, if ye are truthful) that we will be resurrected after death?
